meanings.sent1: The soily boots left muddy prints on the floor.
meanings.sent2: Her hands were soily after gardening in the backyard.
meanings.sent3: The soily puppy rolled around in the dirt, making a mess.
meanings.sent4: The old book had soily pages, yellowed with age and use.
meanings.sent5: The soily path through the forest was difficult to navigate.

meanings.sent1: The soily smell of the garden filled the air after the rain.
meanings.sent2: The soily texture of the cake made it moist and rich.
meanings.sent3: The soily color of the paint reminded her of freshly turned earth.
meanings.sent4: Her soily hands were evidence of a day spent in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The soily taste of the vegetables came from the organic soil they were grown in.
